<h3 id="X8583">X(8583)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ATIK AND 2nd CIRCUMPERP</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a (a^3-a^2 b-a b^2+b^3-a^2 c+6 a b c+3 b^2 c-a c^2+3 b c^2+c^3) : :
<p>
